name: Raven Squad
summary: Raven Squad is an RTS-FPS game placed deep in the Amazon Jungles of the year 2011. The game is one of the firsts to blend FPS and Strategy (RTS Unit Movement) together, creating a new and unique genre. The player is able to switch among the two view modes anytime. The RTS tactical view gives the player a live satellite point of view of the battlefield. This is balanced with the intensity of cover-to-cover FPS fighting. creates a unique combination of RTS/FPS gameplay experience. Faster, more dynamic RTS gameplay, and squad control while in FPS view.
